org.lafayette.server.webapp.api.filter

Class AuthenticationResourceFilters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lafayette.server.webapp.api.filter.AuthenticationResourceFilters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.jersey.spi.container.ResourceFilterFactory

    @Provider
public class AuthenticationResourceFilters
extends Object
implements com.sun.jersey.spi.container.ResourceFilterFactory
    Filters the request/response for authentication. Filter is only applied to resource methods with annotation Authentication.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter
